sqlMap.select: SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.*, to_char( (SELECT WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD) FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 WHERE T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD='C1' AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = S.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ) ) AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , to_char( (SELECT WM_CONCAT(COUNT(*)) FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 WHERE T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD='C1' AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = S.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO GROUP BY T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD) ) AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , A.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , A.FCLTS_GBN , CASE A.FCLTS_GBN WHEN '1' THEN '1종' WHEN '2' THEN '2종' WHEN '3' THEN '1종/2종' WHEN '9' THEN '기타' ELSE '기타' END AS FCLTS_GBN_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_SE_NM(A.FCLTS_SE) AS FCLTS_SE_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_KND_NM(A.FCLTS_KND) AS FCLTS_KND_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT , TO_CHAR(A.CNST_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'~'||TO_CHAR(A.CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNST_DT , A.OWNER , A.CNSTRTR , A.LOC FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F A LEFT OUTER JOIN FENDER_INSPECTION B ON(A.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = B.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ) WHERE CVL_ENG_FCLTY_USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO IS NULL AND A.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM like '%'||'임항도로'||'%' ) S
